data.name: Obama Maze - Fund the Developer.
data.detailed_description: Thank you for playing Obama Maze. If you'd like to help get me away from my minimum wage job you can buy this DLC which doesn't include anything. Eventually I will add rewards for this item, for example maybe a multiplayer badge or something. For now this currently is just a donation.
data.about_the_game: Thank you for playing Obama Maze. If you'd like to help get me away from my minimum wage job you can buy this DLC which doesn't include anything. Eventually I will add rewards for this item, for example maybe a multiplayer badge or something. For now this currently is just a donation.
data.short_description: Thank you for playing Obama Maze. If you'd like to help get me away from my minimum wage job you can buy this DLC which doesn't include anything. It may eventually but I am not sure.

data.legal_notice: This game is not an opinion or meant to defame the former United States President. This is a merely a comedy-horror game.
